name: Street Pool
description:
Take your game to the streets!

Street Pool is a local-multiplayer 1v1 game of Eight Ball Pool, but you play by your own rules.

Battle against your friends and  against our totally accurate physics simulation in the only ragdoll-based top-down sports-strategy-shooter game of Pool.

*2 gamepad controllers required to play

Helpful Developer Controls:

  • R to restart if bad things happen and you feel frustrated
  • Esc to quit if bad things keep happening and you feel really frustrated
  • Breathe deeply while repeating "game developers are people too"
Credits:

Bracken Hall & Kevin Macfarlane

*Pool Cue Hitting Ball sound by 150112 licensed under CC BY-NC 3.0
